alert.note: Alert for Pike; Walthall (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 5:35PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Tangipahoa and western Washington Parishes, southern Walthall and southeastern Pike Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 534 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Sandy Hook, moving southwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Franklinton, Mount Herman and Dexter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
